body.name: VICTONE Convertible Sectional Sofa Couch, 3 Seat L-Shaped Sofa with Linen Fabric, Movable Ottoman Small Couch for Small Apartments, Living Room and Office (Dark Gray)
features: [2 Packages Shipped] Your sectional couch sofa will be delivered in two packages. If you do not receive all of them at the same time, please contact us, or just wait a bit as the other one is running to you whip and spur.

[Comfortable & Soft Convertible Sectional Sofa] Made of high-density sponge, covered with breathable soft linen fabric, the high-resilience couch will provide you comfortable and soft cloud touch experience. The cushions are vacuum-packed. Thus, in order to get the best experience, please wait 48 hours to let it become the original shape.

[Durable & Washable] Constructed from solid natural wood, S-shaped alloy springs, and high elastic bandages, the couch is durable and stable for long-term use. The cushion covers are removable and washable, easy for you to keep clean.

[Movable Ottoman] The reversible ottoman has multipurpose uses. Usually, you can put it on the left or right side to make it a side chaise recliner. Also, you can function it as a separate sofa stool, placing it anywhere you want in the room.

[Usage Scenario Advice] VICTONE small L-shaped couch is perfect for space-limited apartments, student dormitories, or offices. If you want a set of comfortable sofa but your room is not big enough, our sofa will be your first choice!
body.description: VICTONE Convertible Sectional Sofa Couch TIPS: 1.The couch will be delivered in two packages. If you don’t get them at the same time, you can contact us to confirm the logistics and tracking of invoices, or just wait a little bit, because the other one is running whip and spur to you. 2.The cushions need 48 hours to become the original shape.For the convenience of transportation, the cushions are vacuum-packed. So you have to open it and let it bounce back to its normal shape within 48 hours. 3.Our couch fits in a small and limited-space room.Before you buy it, please check out the size and details. Why do you choose VICTONE sectional couch? 1.Comfortable and Durable-The cushions you sit on are nice and firm because of high-quality materials and stable structures. The more you sit in it the better. 2.Soft and Washable-VICTONE convertible sofa is covered with soft washable linen fabric. Movable Ottoman and L Shape-The movable ottoman has multipurpose uses. You will get a L-shaped couch if you put the ottoman on the left or the right. The reversible ottoman can be used as a separate stool as well.

productInformation.value: 3.0 3.0 out of 5 stars 137 ratings 3.0 out of 5 stars

productInformation.name: Best Sellers Rank
productInformation.value: #62,628 in Home & Kitchen (See Top 100 in Home & Kitchen) #32 in Sofas & Couches

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Don't buy this
reviews.reviewText: I was surprised when it showed up in 2 small boxes. I wanted to send it back right then but one box was very heavy and I'm 62yrs old, not in great shape and couldn't see myself managing to get it to the place for return. After assembling it, it's very very small and does not look like the picture at all. Cheap cheap cheap. Afraid to even sit on it. Plastic legs, cushions are not fluffy like the picture depicted. Very disappointed. If there was a way to vacuum seal the cushions and get it all in original box I would definitely be sending it back. To top it off I bought through Affirm so I'm paying inverter on it as well. Save your money. Buy a couch you can see and feel first.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great For The Price
reviews.reviewText: Some of the reviews on here were making me not want to buy it, but i pulled the plug and it didn’t disappoint. i built it by myself (22y/o girl, not strong) took a little under an hour for me to build. i got my packages at the same time, but the really long box is the one you will want to build first if you get that package first as it’s the structure of the couch. took a little under 12 hours for the full full shape to form, but perfect for the price and perfect for a small apartment type couch. one con i will have to say is sitting straight up is not the most comfortable as there isnt much “cushion length” but the ottoman makes up for it. overall great bang for your buck.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Its honestly pretty good
reviews.reviewText: When i ordered it for some reason i didnt read the reviews until after so i was a little worried i wasted my money, but it turned out pretty good. We were looking for a cheap couch for our first apartment and this was definitely a good choice. It wouldnt be very comfy to sleep on but for just lounging its pretty comfy. I don’t recommend getting this if your over 5 feet tall as it is really small. But just make sure you read the measurements. There is a weird black stripe on the bottom front of the couch that wasn’t pictured but ive just chosen to ignore it. I also want to note that if you clean up a stain pretty fast it doesnt stain. The first time we sat on it my boyfriend spilled buffalo sauce on it we just rubbed it with warm water and it came right out! Overall pretty good first couch.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Worst quality product.
reviews.reviewText: The sizes of the cushions are much bigger than the base and won’t fit properly. The cushions didn’t blow up completely, wrinkles can be seen on the cushions even after 6 days. The velcro of the back rest is short and won’t attach to the base. It’s a waste of money and time to assemble all the parts. The seller is also not very helpful in returning the item. I highly recommend not to buy it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Get What You Pay For
reviews.reviewText: I just needed a cheap couch to lounge on in my small apartment. The size is perfect. My only complaint is the thin cushions. You can see in my pictures how they look after more then a week of recieving the couch. The seat cushions were vacuum packed so they did actually get bigger but the back cushions are still uncomfortably thin. I also failed to consider the seat depth and back height but that's my fault for not checking the measurements. I would also recommend getting some pillows for the armrest as they are not comfortable. Also I was able to assemble this myself without much issue.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This couch is on the small side.
reviews.reviewText: 5 STARS FOR A KIDS COUCH!!! If my kids were still little I would have loved this for their playroom. Easy to assemble. If you are looking for a couch for your kids playroom ages 2-10 or if you need a SMALL couch that's low to the ground this is for you! I don't recommend for an office or for anyone above 5 feet 3 inches, or only because it's small and low to the ground. I don't like the plastic legs either. The cushions and material are very good. I can tell you that the company is very pleasant to deal with and since this couch wasn't for me, I contacted them and let them know I needed to return it and they responded immediately and sent me the labels/instructions for return quickly. So I would give it 5 stars for a kids couch and for a kids room or playroom and/or small person couch but no stars for adults over 5 ft 3 inches. There you have it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Please Check Dimension!
reviews.reviewText: It's small not comfortable, quality is ok. Easy to assemble but so small that it's impossible to sit on

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The description and product reviews are a bit misleading. This sofa would be perfect for a child or tween's bedroom or play room. I absolutely do not recommend purchasing it as an adult, even if you have a small apartment or small living room. The cushions are firm and uncomfortable. Our standard size coffee table is taller than the seating. The seat is also too narrow for an adult. I'm 5'4" and my legs hang off the end of the chaise. 1/10 stars.
